messages.title: Brooks Newmark - For All Our Communities
messages.content: Support from the constituency of Braintree. Helping Hanover Square.

messages.title: Brooks Newmark: A Strong Voice
messages.content: Brooks Newmark fighting for our hospital. I live locally with my wife, Lucy, and our five children.

messages.title: Solving Braintree's Transport Problems
messages.content: Under Labour, local rail services have become overcrowded and expensive.

messages.title: Solving Labour's Debt Crisis
messages.content: Gordon Brown has mismanaged our country's finances and taken Britain from boom to bust.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for a stronger business community that can create local jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making Braintree Work, I Will Fight for More Police on the Beat
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anti-social behaviour won't be tolerated in Braintree.
I will ensure that Braintree plays its part in tackling climate change.
Brooks Newmark will work to fix the Labour government's problematic fiscal policies.

issues.economy: Solving Labour's Debt Crisis: Gordon Brown has mismanaged our country's finances and taken Britain from boom to bust.
issues.environment: A Greener Braintree: I will ensure that Braintree plays its part in tackling climate change.
issues.health: Brooks Newmark fighting for our hospital

leaflet.personalStatement: I live locally with my wife, Lucy, and our five children. I have been an active member of our community for the past 10 years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Brooks has worked to deliver for all our communities and fought a tough campaign with practical results.

images.caption: Brooks Newmark participated in a variety of community activities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains multiple photographs of the candidate engaging with the community and quotes from constituents.
